entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-09-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • No error reported for `ref` type in a declaration expression #64259
  • Replace `DeclarationScope` with `ScopedKind` #64248
    Compiler.Next
  • Building a .NET 7 RC1 Project with VS Causing CS8032 #64243
  • (a, b) is (int? x, int y) can be circumvented with (a, b) is (var x, var y) #64239
  • static interface methods not emitted when interface marked ComImport #64238
    17.4
  • Code completion for mixed whitespace characters in raw string #64237
  • Add a new Location.Create overload for external file location with a different mappedLineSpan #64236
    17.4

Closed

  • LSIF tool fails with duplicate analyzers #59883
    17.4
  • InvalidCastException: cannot cast NonErrorNamedTypeSymbol to IMethodSymbol #64251
  • Rename operation should have a wait dialog #62777
    17.4
  • C#, "Move to namespace" bad performance. #64072
    17.4
  • Inconsistent / missing errors for scoped keyword usages #62490
    17.4
  • A `ref T` field where `T` is `unmanaged` is itself treated as `unmanaged` #62528
    17.4
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-32923.100 #64250
  • stackalloc should be disallowed for structs with ref fields #63104
    17.4
  • Invalid hyperlink in JavaScript diagnostics #64145
    17.4

PullRequests

Created

  • Use AdditionalFilterTexts in enum member completion #64261
    Area-IDE
  • Allow TS to derive from the more performant internal API #64258
    Area-IDE
  • Disallow methods with bodies in ComImport interfaces. #64257
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Default Interface Impl
  • Fix miscellaneous LSIF indexing issues to better match the 0.6.0 spec #64256
    Area-IDE
  • Support `scoped` keyword in `using` statements. #64245
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Improve ref assignment error message wording #64241
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Add a new Location.Create overload for external file location with a different mappedLineSpan #64240
    Area-Analyzers

Merged

  • Only show expander in CS/VB document #64252
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Fix handling of duplicate analyzer references in CommandLineProject #64255
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #64254
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Remove editor item from MatchResult #64229
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Add ScopedKind to IParameterSymbol and ILocalSymbol #64190
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Remove double periods in telemetry properties #64247
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #64249
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Try to reduce JIT costs for AbstractLogAggregator #64172
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Add support to avoid showing F1 help for TS diagnostics #64242
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #64244
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Support `scoped` keyword in `for` statement. #64154
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields, Next
  • Support `scoped` keyword in `foreach` statement. #64209
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #64233
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main to features/solutionEvents #64235
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/CLaSP #64234
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • Show linked symbol in Inheritance Margin #60225
    Area-IDE
  • Trigger refactor notify on Renamer.RenameDocumentAsync #55033
    Area-IDE
  • Check method arguments must match for property accessors #63809
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • TextLoader method override detection #64192
    Area-IDE
  • Format parameters as names in error messages #64179
    Area-Compilers
  • Use warnings for escape analysis in unsafe context #64186
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Remove code that thinks it needs to close a document before removing #64232
    Area-IDE
  • Semantic snippets - for loop snippet #62990
    Area-IDE
  • Add support for reporting analyzer diagnostics in editorconfig files #64214
    Area-IDE, Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers
  • Fix confusing `ref` usage error messages #64183
    Area-Compilers
  • Record added node output states as new #61575
    Area-Compilers, Community
